page.description: Sets file attributes for a file (-/+ R-readonly H-hidden A-Archive N-Normal).
page.prototype: Result as C = FILE.Attributes_Set(C filename,C attributes)

argument.name: attributes
argument.description: File attributes to set. To turn an attribute on, you specify a flag of *[xb:+<attribute>]*, where <attribute> is "R", "H", or "A". To turn an attribute off, you specify a flag of *[xb:-<attribute>]*.

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns a list of file attribute flags for the specified file. Use the *[link:FILE.EXISTS Function]* to determine whether or not the file exists.

page.discussion: The FILE.ATTRIBUTES_SET() method sets the attributes for Filename. You can turn on or off the read-only, hidden, and archive attributes.

section.description: This turns off the read-only flag of a file.
section.example: fn = "c:\data\customer.dbf" file.attributes_set(fn, "-R") 'This turns off the read-only flag and sets the Archive flag file.attributes_set(fn, "-R + A")
